newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Santos says H2 outlook is positive.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Santos says H2 outlook is positive.

text.p: Oil and gas producer Santos Ltd said on Monday its performance in the first half of calendar 1996 was solid and its outlook was positive.
The company, which derives most of its revenue from production in the onshore Cooper/Eromanga basins, said second half sales would improve.

"With the development of the new Stag field (in the Carnarvon Basin of Western Australia) under way, the continued growth in the gas business and exploration success, the company's outlook is positive," Santos said in a statement accompanying its first half results.
